Caudal block

Caudal block Epidural block, risk of intravascular injection and dural puncture (dura ends at S2 but lower in infants).

In infants, rule of quarters: use 1/8 to 1/4% Bupivacaine. 1/4ml/kg for sacral block, 2/4ml/kg lumbar, 3/4ml/kg low-thoracic and 4/4 4/4ml/kg high-thoracic.

[Morton CEACCP 2004]
